channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-2330] DIH Examples Will Not Run
item.description:
Examples will not run. The solrconfig.xml files for each of the cores under $SOLR_TRUNK\solr\example\example-DIH\solr are missing the luceneMatchVersion tag.

NFO: Adding 'file:/C:/Projects/apache-solr-trunk2/solr/example/example-DIH/solr/db/lib/hsqldb-1.8.0.10.jar' to classloader
9:59:40,196 ERROR [STDERR] Jan 22, 2011 7:59:40 PM org.apache.solr.common.SolrException log
EVERE: Error in xpath:java.lang.RuntimeException: solrconfig.xml missing luceneMatchVersion
